commands.name: nowplaying
commands.description: Displays the current track your are listening to.

commands.name: lastfm plays
commands.description: View your plays for an artist.

commands.name: lastfm playstrack
commands.description: View your plays for a track.
example: lastfm tp Die Young | Roddy Ricch

commands.name: lastfm playsalbum
commands.description: View your plays for an album.

commands.name: lastfm topartists
commands.description: View your top ten artists over a period.

commands.name: lastfm topalbums
commands.description: View your top ten albums over a period.

commands.name: lastfm topalbums
commands.description: View your top ten tracks over a period.

commands.name: lastfm collage
commands.description: View a collage for your most listend albums over a period.

commands.name: lastfm whoknows
commands.description: View top listeners for an artist.

commands.name: lastfm whoknowsalbum
commands.description: View top listeners for an album.

commands.name: lastfm whoknowstrack
commands.description: View top listeners for a track.
example: lf wkt Nevada | YoungBoy Never Broke Again

commands.name: lastfm globalwhoknows
commands.description: View global top listeners for an artist.

commands.name: lastfm globalwhoknowsalbum
commands.description: View global top listeners for an album.

commands.name: lastfm globalwhoknowstrack
commands.description: View global top listeners for a track.
